Package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn

package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.tvburger.jdl.model
    Defines the concepts for estimation functions
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.activations
    Implements the different activation functions for neurons
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers
    Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers
    Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances
    Package for distance metrics
    net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
    Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
  • Class
    Description
    ActivationsCachedNeuron
    A Neuron that caches activations for later retrieval.
    ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation
    Represents a single activation of a neuron.
    DefaultNeuralNetwork
    Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
    InputNeuron
    Represents an input neuron in a neural network.
    LastInputStoredNeuron
    A specialized Neuron that remembers the input values from its most recent activation.
    NeuralNetwork
    Represents a neural network as a specific kind of EstimationFunction.
    NeuralNetworks
    Utility methods for Neural Networks
    Neuron
    Represents a single artificial neuron in a neural network.
    NeuronVisitor
    A visitor interface for traversing a NeuralNetwork.
